DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine survival rate patient relapse refractory Wilms ' tumor clear cell sarcoma kidney treat chemotherapy follow surgical resection adjuvant radiotherapy without autologous stem cell rescue . - Determine efficacy toxicity regimens patient . - Determine prognostic variable patient treat regimen . OUTLINE : Patients assign one three treatment regimen . - Regimen A ( patient initial stage I tumors previously treat vincristine without dactinomycin relapse least 6 month diagnosis ) : Patients receive vincristine IV weekly week 1-10 every 3 week week 11-52 , dactinomycin IV every 3 week week 1-52 , doxorubicin IV 6 hour every 3 week week 1-34 ( week 1-28 pulmonary radiotherapy plan ) . Patients undergo surgical resection radiotherapy 6 week therapy . - Regimen B ( patient initial stage II tumors previously treat vincristine dactinomycin relapse least 6 month diagnosis ) : Patients receive cyclophosphamide IV twice daily day 1-2 22-23 , etoposide IV 1 hour day 1-3 , doxorubicin IV 6 hour day 22 23 . Treatment repeat every 42 day total 4 course . Patients undergo surgical resection radiotherapy 2 course chemotherapy . Patients achieve complete response 4 course chemotherapy undergo autologous bone marrow transplantation regimen C. - Regimen C ( patient first relapse OR progression first-line therapy OR second subsequent relapse previously treat regimens A B ) : Patients receive carboplatin IV 1 hour day 1 , etoposide IV 2 hour day 1-3 22-24 , cyclophosphamide IV twice daily day 22 23 . Treatment repeat every 42 day total 3 course . Patients may undergo surgical resection prior stem cell rescue . Beginning within 6 week completion chemotherapy , patient receive melphalan IV day -1 . Autologous peripheral blood stem cell bone marrow reinfused day 0 . Patients undergo radiotherapy transplantation . Patients follow every 8 week 1 year , every 12 week 1 year , every 6 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 75 patient ( 25 regimens A B 50 regimen C ) accrue study .
